sentences.en: About 40 dividing wall columns ( DWC ) have been applied industrially.
sentences.cn: 其中的分隔壁精馏塔已有40座以上工业化.

sentences.en: Barium as barite ( barium sulfate ) is used industrially as a white pigment for paint.
sentences.cn: 钡以重晶石形态 ( 硫酸钡 ) 在工业上用作油漆的白色涂料.

sentences.en: Fermentation is one of potential methods for producing lycopene industrially by Blakeslea trispora.
sentences.cn: 利用三孢布拉氏霉菌发酵生产番茄红素具有较大的工业化生产潜力.

sentences.en: He added: “You can imagine a situation when some of our industrially important but polluting processes are done in space and the finished products are brought back down to Earth.
sentences.cn: 他补充说：“你可以想象一种情况，当我们的一些工业污染的过程是重要的，但做的空间和成品带回了地球。

sentences.en: Indeed, most industrially significant synthetic chemicals are derived from petroleum sources.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 大多数工业上重要的化学合成物均源自石油.

sentences.en: Other tool materials are being used for more and more often industrially.
sentences.cn: 其它工具材料在工业上也应用得越来越多.

sentences.en: Polymer flooding, as one of most important EOR technologies, has been applied industrially.
sentences.cn: 聚合物驱作为油田开发提高采收率的一种重要技术手段, 已经进入工业化应用阶段,技术相对比较成熟.

sentences.en: Several sulfur compounds with halogen elements are industrially important.
sentences.cn: 硫与卤素的几种化合物在工业上有重要用途.

sentences.en: Starch prepared from corn grains, used industrially and as a thickener in cooking.
sentences.cn: 颗粒里几乎完全是软淀粉的玉米.

sentences.en: The alloys of iron and carbon are the most important alloys used industrially.
sentences.cn: 铁碳合金是工业上使用的最重要的合金.

sentences.en: They are already employed industrially to shape soft and light metals, such as aluminium and copper.
sentences.cn: 在比如铝和铜这些质地柔韧并且密度小的金属成型工艺中, EMPs已经被成功的应用.

sentences.en: They are usually carried out industrially by pack cementation or hot dip process.
sentences.cn: 目前工业上常用的渗铝方法有固体包装法和热浸法.

sentences.en: We should run all undertakings industrially and thriftily.
sentences.cn: 我们要勤俭办一切事业.

sentences.en: What I earn industrially just can keep Body and soul together.
sentences.cn: 我勤奋工作的所得仅足以糊口.

words.tran_cn: 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的
产业主义，工业主义；工业制度
实业家；工业家；产业工人
使工业化；将…组成产业（industrialize的过去分词）
